name: nonrandomness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of happening according to a plan or system, rather than by chance: Most living systems display non-randomness. Researchers have tended to ignore the issue of non-randomness in educational achievement. Related word
random
More examplesFewer examplesTwo different mechanisms may determine the nonrandomness that we observe.They were mistaken to think that the non-randomness in the system was intentional. Cows are known to select the more palatable grasses for grazing, which might introduce an element of non-randomness into the data. This simple principle can be used to generate non-randomness.
